Android Application Engineer (f/m/d) (Budapest)

Android Application Engineer (f/m/d)
Who is Cinemo?
Cinemo is a fast paced, highly successful global company, a hidden champion, located at the heart of Karlsruhe (Germany), Budapest (Hungary) and Seoul (South Korea). With our team of 200+ international people, we are creating embedded and cloud software for the next generations of In-Vehicle Infotainment (IVI) systems. Our customers are top branded automotive companies around the world.
We are working to empower any device with media. We are growing fast, breathing innovation and customer centricity. For our team we need exceptionally talented, bright people with a drive to work hard for their customers, both internally and externally. If you would like to help us get our software and cloud services into every car, this is your chance to make history.
Position Description:
As one of our Android experts in our Software Engineering department, you develop Apps for the Android platform demonstrating the best usage of our award-winning IVI products.
Responsibilities:
You innovate, develop and maintain mobile Apps using our core product
You produce well documented code with focus on high quality, robustness and maintainability
You keep up with the latest Android related technologies
You will collaborate with software engineers, UX designers, solution architects, but also with our customer support team and the QA department
Experience & Skills:
At least 4+ years of working experience in Android Application development
Excellent Kotlin¬†programming skills using the Google Android SDK
Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles and patterns (Play Store certification process)
Very good experience in CarPlay
Ability to write clean, maintainable and documented code which others can collaborate on
Experience with the Android NDK and JNI code is preferable
You can read and understand C++ and Java source code
Is self-motivated, self-reliant and solution driven
Is always learning, curious, and open to new ideas
Has good written and verbal English communication skills
Place of employment‚Äã: 1056 Budapest, V√°ci utca 81.¬†or¬†Karlsruhe
Benefits/perks:
Additional Healthcare benefit
Flexible working hours
31 days holiday per year
Hybrid working
Relocation support (international)
Modern and powerful hardware
Fruit, drinks and snacks for free
Central and modern offices
Free parking spaces
Challenging innovative projects with impressive customers
Reimbursement of optional German/ English language course
Lucrative referral program
Home office equipment // Ready for work
Salary range for (depending on seniority):
¬†45 000‚Ç¨- 60 000‚Ç¨ per year gross
The successful candidate will be based at our offices: Cinemo GmbH, Kaiserstr. 72, 76133 Karlsruhe, Germany.
If you are passionate about new technology and keen on working within an international team, Cinemo is looking for you!

The Boschung Group is a world leader in the development and production of solutions for the efficiency and safety of traffic surfaces for the world‚Äôs largest airports, busiest highways and most visited cities and municipalities across the globe.¬†
In our Boschung Technology Center, headquarter of the group based in Payerne, Switzerland and our numerous other locations around the world, everything we accomplish is a result of the strong partnership we have with the people in our team. Looking to strengthen the IT-Support team right away or by agreement, Boschung Mecatronic is recruiting a:
IT-Support Technician 100%
(Remote work & periodic on-site visits. English required; Workplace in Hungary)
Your tasks
Implementation of new IT infrastructure services, including standard system documentation
Support and troubleshooting of various IT components and services
Maintenance and installation processes from IT services (SFTP servers, VPN, IoT devices, Linux OS Server‚Äôs administration)
Monitor our IT platforms and detect incidents & improvements
Daily use of databases (MySQL)
Technical support
Participation in the on-call service
Your profile
Computer scientist or equivalent education/work experience
Organized and structured work method, both independently and in a team
English and German languages are required, French is an asset
Proven understanding and experience with GNU/Linux systems, network administration (Debian based) and networking technologies (ie. VPN, VLANs)
Basic experience with monitoring, diagnostic and analysis tools (e.g. checkmk, centreon)
What we have to offer
You will be able to carry out a variety of activities in a modern infrastructure and a successful company!
You will be familiarized with your new task with the support of a talented and motivated team working with the latest technologies!
We offer attractive terms and conditions and will be happy to support you in your professional development!
Are you interested in working for Boschung Mecatronic? If so, contact us!
We look forward to receiving your complete application documents (CV in English) and guarantee the utmost discretion when processing your application.

Full Stack Software Engineer 100%
(Remote work & periodic on-site visits. English required; Workplace in Hungary)

Conception and development of API-based solutions and microservices using frameworks like Spring or SpringBoot

The Boschung Group is a world leader in the development and production of solutions for the efficiency and safety of traffic surfaces for the world‚Äôs largest airports, busiest highways and most visited cities and municipalities across the globe.
In our Boschung Technology Center, headquarter of the group based in Payerne, Switzerland, and our numerous other locations around the world, everything we accomplish is a result of the strong partnership we have with the people in our team. Looking to strengthen the IT-Support team right away or by agreement, BOSCHUNG MECATRONIC is recruiting a:
DevOps Engineer 100% 
(Remote work & periodic on-site visits. English required; Workplace in Hungary)
Your tasks
Set up new IT infrastructure services including documentation of the standard system
Configure and install various IT infrastructure components and services (e.g. servers, blades, compute fabric, network fabric, virtualization platform)
Automation of maintenance and installation processes
Participation in the observability-stack to monitor our platform and identify improvements
Reporting on the status of specific IT infrastructure projects by collecting/prioritizing information; actively participating in projects
Daily use of databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Scylla)
Your profile
Bachelor of Science in Informatics or equivalent education/professional experience.
Organized and structured way of working both autonomously and as part of a team
Fluent in English, French and/or German is a plus
Experience in working with networks and virtualized services
Experience setting up and maintaining secondary data centers
Experience participating in projects related to the network design & solutions architecture
Good understanding / experience in virtualization technologies and containerization (Proxmox, Open Stack, K8s)
Understanding of / experience with GNU/Linux systems, network administration (Debian-based) and network technologies (VPN, L2, Access, Port Channel, Trunk, VLANs, BGP)
Programming in Shell and Python
Good understanding of storage technologies and protocols (Ceph, iSCSI, NFS)
Hands-on experience with monitoring, diagnostic, and analysis tools such as Prometheus and Nagios
Knowledge of modern configuration management tools (e.g. Git, Ansible).
What we have to offer
You will be able to carry out a variety of activities in a modern infrastructure and a prosperous business
You will be familiarised with your new task with the support of a talented and motivated team, working with de latest technologies!
We offer attractive terms and conditions and will be happy to support you in your professional development
Are you interested in working for Boschung Mecatronic? Then get in touch with us!
We look forward to receiving your complete application documents (CV in English)¬†and guarantee absolute discretion in processing your application.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Service Chain Operations Manager (REF1549H)
Tasks:
Responsible for service chains of a specific business service / product cross various organizational units.
Responsible for KPIs and SLAs / OLAs of the contracted services.
Accountable for technical content of operational / specialized technical concepts.¬†
Ensure the quality of provided services and provides operational support.
Coordinate, manage and monitor operational performance.
Identify, formulate and implement the improvement of processes and policies to maximize operational output.
Steer the respective Operation Managers.
Operational interface between the production, the service delivery management (SDM) and other delivery units for the ordered delivery¬†elements.¬†
Explanation of production options for SDM.¬†
Accountable for the default reporting ordered by the SDM.
Monitor, manage and improve the efficiency of provided services.
Single point of contact towards the internal customer.
Requirements:
English and/or German language knowledge (C1 level)
Proactive problem solving ability
At least 1 year of Operation Manager experience
Good knowledge of IT services, architectures and IT Service Management
Experience in optimizing operational processes
Team-management experience
ITIL Foundation certificate, and/or equivalent work experience
Project management experience
Advantage
Service Delivery Manager experience
Experience with Cloud operation and technologies
German language knowledge
Personality
Strong interpersonal skills
Structural problem-solving abilities
Analytical skills and the ability to interpret
Proactive approach
Ability to work in team
Willingness to change, flexibility
Stress resistant
Customer, value, result and performance orientation
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.¬†
Cloud Application Operation "DevOps Engineer" - REF122O
You build it, you run it!
To support a German government contract we are seeking a high profile DevOps team to build up and support a system with 80Million users. In the ramp up phase we seek the skill overkill to assure the best possible service from the start. The skills required are based on DevOps principles and specific toolset. Some elements as on call are very well known not desired by many, but a true DevOps has the mentality to build it as good, that he never has to wake up at night.
Are you up to the task?
Conception, implementation, operation and documentation for cloud projects, solutions and products
Customer consulting on cloud architecture and intensive collaboration with developers and internal departments of customers around agile DevOps and operational processes
Collobaration and controlling in DevOps topics for agile methods (consulting and operations projects)
Deployment Automation with Infrastructure-as-Code and configuration management tools
Conception, enhancements and optimization for continuous integration, continuous delivery
Application transformation using cloud-native-architecture
Improvement of availability and performance
Support for simple programming tasks (Python, Java)
Perform health checks, optimize monitoring and executing deployments in cloud environments
Troubleshooting and participation in call readiness
Presentation of concepts and solutions for the customer
Requirements
Successfully completed study of computer science or comparable graduation respectively professional experience in comparable position
Deep experience in DevOps environment (git, Jenkins/GitLab)
Basic knowledge in ITIL
Programming experience in Python, Java or other programming languages
Very good basic knowlege in handling with Linux
Experience with automation tools like Ansible or Terraform
Experience with NGINX, KONG, Redis, Postgres, Docker, Jenkins, Grafana und Prometheus
Experience in cloud environment / cloud technologies (Azure, Kubernetes, Docker)
Logical reasoning and pro active solution finding on a technical level
Willingness to travel
Knowledge of infrastructure capabilities (network, VMs, OS)
Good knowledge about SM9, CMDB, ... (intern tools)
Can create structured documentation
Willingness for on-call service
English language skills
Soft skills
Customer-oriented thinking and handling (service)
Ability to communicate and work under pressure
Poise, teamwork, flexibility and initiative
Location
Budapest

Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. Senior Security Consultant (REF1365Q)
Consulting CU Shell tribes, projects and client with security & compliance expertise on request.¬†Security Consultant will often be engaged on more than one project or assignment at any one time. Security engagements will vary in budget and duration.Security Consultant will be accountable to deliver the agreed scope ¬†within budgets ¬†and should be fully chargeable to projects.¬†Key Accountabilities:Providing and maintaining methods and processes according to ITIL to support the ¬†IT Risk Management programs¬†and fulfilling the customers‚Äô expectations in Compliance, Security and Operations.¬†Providing technical security end-to-end advice and consultancy to internal and external customers of the CU Shell in line with Shell and T-Systems Project Excellence standards and processes.Ensuring that all customer security and compliance requirements and expectations are met in line with all applicable T-Systems security standards.(PSA / ESARIS)Identification of security requirements within the scope of a proposal or project.¬†

thyssenkrupp is an international group of companies comprising largely independent industrial and technology businesses and employing 96,000 people. Across 48 countries it generated sales of ‚Ç¨41 billion in fiscal year 2021/22. Backed by extensive technological know-how, the businesses develop cost-effective and resource-friendly solutions to the challenges of the future, especially in the fields of climate protection, the energy transition, digital transformation in the industry and mobility of the future.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 4500 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.¬†
DevOps Engineer ARD (TECHNIK HU/ VNI) (REF217J)
Tasks
Develop and use software solutions and specify IP access and IP service functions for integration in a heterogeneous system environment
Accompany and control the technical implementation of these functions in national and international projects and balance the factors of innovation, time-to-market and sustainability with a sure instinct
Work in DevOps teams in organizational, procedural and personal agility closely with the product owner and other partners
Design and implement standards for system tests and test automation in E2E responsibility and with the aim of ensuring a high degree of automation
Requirements
Ability to use common development tools (e.g. shell, Git, GitLab)
Knowledge and skills in writing source code and computer programs in Python
Knowledge of data modeling (YANG, XSLT, Swagger) and interface design (JSON, XML, REST, OpenAPI) is desirable
Knowledge of CI / CD ( Unit Testing, Jenkins, Gherkin and behave, GitLab Pipelines)
Knowledge of cloud platforms (Kubernetes, ERXi)
English B2
Location
Budapest

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Operation Manager Agile (PowerPlatform) (REF1408G)
We are looking for¬†you¬†as Operations Manager Agile to support our team for operations with a focus on PowerPlatform!
If you would like to work on tasks below, don't hesitate to apply!
Operations and Engineering for Power Platform
Creating, reading and evaluating monitoring information of the Power BI Platform (number of API requests, connection via On DataGateway etc)
Monitoring of the PowerBI Platform with the help of the Center of Execllent Starter Kit
Creation and implementation of own reporting for the evaluation of operational monitoring information
Knowledge of the Power BI infrastructure (Power BI Shared, Premium, embedded), creation of simple data sources and workspaces
Knowledge of connecting OnPrem DataGateway, incl. troubleshooting and monitoring of operating parameters
Basic knowledge in creating reports
Implementing architecture concepts on the PowerBI infrastructure
Performing administrative tasks on PowerBI, such as creating workspaces, assigning licences, etc.
Troubleshooting the Power BI infrastructure together with customer representatives.
Communication with Microsoft support
You can apply to this position, if you have some experience in using all of the following tools:
Experience and knowledge in the Microsoft technology world¬†
Basic experience in Office / M365, at least as a user of the services.
Understanding in user management of M365. Azure ActiveDirectory / use of AzureActive Directory groups.
Basic knowledge of PowerShell, such as installing modules, running scripts.
Basic knowledge of Cloud.( SaaS, PaaS, IaC etc).
Basic knowledge of Azure.Cloud technology. (-> what is sub scripting, what is VM etc.. )
Languages: English;¬†German is an advantage

Thyssenkrupp

angol - k√∂z√©pfok√∫
thyssenkrupp is an international group of companies comprising largely independent industrial and technology businesses and employing 96,000 people. Across 48 countries it generated sales of ‚Ç¨41 billion in fiscal year 2021/22. Backed by extensive technological know-how, the businesses develop cost-effective and resource-friendly solutions to the challenges of the future, especially in the fields of climate protection, the energy transition, digital transformation in the industry and mobility of the future.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive.
Senior software engineer
Le√≠r√°s
Your responsibilities
Design and implementation of application software components and functions for real-time embedded systems
You can choose from several sub-areas, depending on where you feel at more comfortable:
hardware near software components development
creating generic software modules
implementation of customer-specific functions
Analysis and breakdown of customer requirements and specifications to system/ function and software level
Software function design
Software component development
Verification of software components
Integration of the components to create a fully functional software package
Integrating third party solutions into our system
Debugging on real hardware or remote test environment
Participation in planning of the team's work according to our development processes
Collaboration with internal and external partners like other software developers, test department, customer team etc.
Requirements:
University degree (BSc, MSc, PhD) in a technical field: Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, or comparable
Expertise in embedded software development in C
Knowledge of analog and digital hardware for hardware-based programming

Result-oriented thinking
Good problem-solving attitude and creativity
Ability to work in team
Communication level English knowledge - written and spoken
Advantage:

Further foreign language knowledge is in addition an advantage
Offers:

You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
We support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of our positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
We organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)

Incident responder (cert) ref68o
Als CERT Incident Responder bearbeiten Sie Cyber Security Incidents aus allen Gesellschaften des Konzerns Deutsche Telekom und verantworten die Koordination und Steuerung des Incident Handlings.
Ihre
Aufgaben im Einzelnen:
Annahme, Vorpr√ºfung und Bearbeitung von Meldungen zu Cyber Security Incidents
Mitarbeit in Projektteams zur Behandlung von komplexen Cyber Security Incidents

Kontinuierlicher Transfer neuer Erkenntnisse, Angriffsmuster und Abwehrm√∂glichkeiten aus dem Cyber Emergency Response Team (CERT) in das Security Operations Center (SOC)
Mitarbeit an der Neuentwicklung und Pflege der Suchmuster im Security Information & Event Management (SIEM)
Mitarbeit bei der Weiterentwicklung des Cyber Defense Centers
Malware-Grundanalyse
Neben einem abgeschlossenen Studium der Informatik oder einer vergleichbaren Berufsausbildung verf√ºgen Sie √ºber Berufserfahrung im Security-Umfeld - idealerweise in einem Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT) oder Cyber Defense Center. Au√üerdem √ºberzeugen Sie mit folgenden

Security Analyst (REF92A)

What makes you capable to fulfil this position?¬†If you love to learn and you have a need for continuous developmentIf you know network models (OSI, TCP/IP)¬†If you know how operating systems work (Windows, Linux)¬†You speak English or German on business level¬†It's not a problem if you have to spend about one-third of your working hours in shiftsIf¬†above all these...:¬†You have basic knowledge of script languages: python, bash, JS¬†and so on¬†You are familiar with the logs of security systems: proxy, AV, WAF, IDS, Webserver, DNS¬†You've done PCAP analysis¬†...hop in to the T-SEC ship and let's see if we can work together.¬†

With over 200 years of experience in industry and cutting-edge technologies thyssenkrupp is active in automotive engineering, logistics, plant technology, steel production and much more. Our group have more than 106,000 employees in nearly 80 countries and annual sales of ‚Ç¨42 billion.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive. 
Scrum Master
Le√≠r√°s
The Scrum Master supports our development teams. You are responsible for developing and enhancing our existing Agile framework and for ensuring that each team member follows this framework. You make sure everyone knows their role and helps coach them through any unclear parts while also guiding larger teams using this method effectively.
Consulting with the team members
Work closely with the assigned Agile teams and increase their effectiveness
Improving the functioning of teams by presenting, understanding and adapting different methodologies and tools
Participates in skill development and attitude formation
Facilitating ceremonies defined by the Agile framework (e.g. sprint planning, sprint review, retrospective)
Keep trainings on Agile principles, methodologies and tools
Help team members to develop their communication skills. Help to understand individual methods and tools and to manage conflicts
Finds the best methods and tools and incorporates them into the daily work
Supporting the development team to remove their blockers
Supporting the management in the identification of improvement opportunities and in the implementation of new methodologies and processes
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a relevant field preferred
In-depth knowledge and practical application of Agile Principles
Experience in using Agile Lifecycle Management tools (preferably JIRA)
Experience in creating training materials and conducting trainings
3+ years of experience in Scrum Master / Agile Coach
Fluent English in spoken and written
Leadership skills:
Always communicate in a transparent and authentic way
Determining and managing tasks, issues, risks, and action items
Scheduling and moderating events, meetings, and decision-making processes
Monitoring progress and performance and helping teams to make improvements
Preparing and presenting status reports to stakeholders
Actively involved in the development of the corporate culture and mindset change
Personality:
Good problem-solving and conflict management skills
Proactivity
Open to new things / technologies
Active attention, empathy
Result oriented and practical thinking
Strong interpersonal, networking, communication and facilitation skills
Efficient, independent and team oriented form of work
Offers:
A modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
We support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of our positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
We organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Senior Project Manager (REF1450G)
As Germany's largest systems integrator with 29,000 employees worldwide, we use artificial intelligence in the focus industries of automotive, manufacturing, logistics and public.
We accompany our customers both in individual projects and through in-house developments.
In projects we support in all phases: Architecture Consulting, Data Engineering, Data Science and DevOps or MLOps. In-house developments, such as the AI Solution Factory, make it possible to provide machine learning applications in higher quality, shorter time and lower costs.
We work customer-oriented with an application focus. Accordingly, we develop on AWS, Azure or the Open Telekom Cloud and advise on what suits our customers. The applications range from computer vision for visual quality monitoring, timeseries forecasting in public transport or natural language processing for the automated assignment of mails.
As ‚ÄúSenior Project Manager‚Äù you are responsible to steer customer projects as well as internal project teams. You support our strategic initiatives to build AI applications as well as building sustainable workflows for out international engineering teams.
In our team, you will take on the following responsibilities:
Management of customer and partnerprojects in the field of AI from proof of concept to execution as operated AI applications
Translation of customer requirements to tangible user stories in order to enable engineering teams to execute those tasks in time, quality and cost
Visualisation and presentation of project results, including customer communication if necessary
Execution and optimization of workflows and structures of our international delivery team, e.g. daily-, review- and retro-session
Project planning and milestone tracking: Creation of project roadmaps together with the product owner
You are a experienced project manager, who can inspire and execute. With drive and personal initiative, you tackle new challenges in the team and drive existing projects forward based on your own experience. You create the environment for technical teams to execute on the tasks. You like customer-centric work and understanding the business problem and you are able to understand and translate technical solution approaches.
You have the following competencies with multiple years of practical experience:
2+ years of experience as project manager, program manager or consultant in software projects
1+ years of experience in agile software projects
2+ years of experience in requirements engineering or solution design 
Basic understanding of software development, DevOps, product or asset development
Very good communication skills in English as well as confident appearance as well as the ability to assert yourself in discussions
An additional benefit would be:
Practical experience as a Scrum Master
Basic understanding of machine learning and AI, cloud solutions or solution design
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Software Engineer (CyberArk) (REF1366M)
T-PAM provides central vault services for the Scalable, secure & GDPR-compliant management of privileged accounts which are used within applications of Deutsche Telekom. Human and non-human users can utilize T-PAM services to securely inject privileged credentials into their own business processes.
The basic product for T-PAM is the ‚ÄúPassword Vault‚Äù system from CyberArk.
T-PAM is currently under construction. The technical structure, operational processes, etc. must therefore be designed primarily. In the future, various projects for connecting applications to the T-PAM infrastructure and for further developing T-PAM functionalities and services are to be implemented.
We are looking for a developer with good analysis skills!
In the T-PAM application (which is based on CyberArk building blocks), we would like to strengthen ourselves with a new colleague in our team.
You:are interested in working in an agile, cross-functional and international Scrum teamenjoy analyzing, clarifying and implementing technical requirementstake responsibility for the implemented functionality, code quality and technical documentationRequirements:You have experience (or willingness to learn )in the development and maintenance of CyberArk plugins resp. connection components or want to learn this (we offer trainings for this)You are fluent in English (since it is our default team language)You have experienced with¬†Python and C#Experience and knowledge are advantageous, but not a requirement:Experience in using REST APIsBasic knowledge of IP network and communication pathsExperience in using cloud technologies of AWS, Azure or the T-Systems FCIExperience in scripting and proficient use of GitGerman language knowledge
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.¬†
Senior Network Architect (Open Telekom Cloud) - REF482J
As a¬†"Senior Architect Network Public Cloud"¬†you understand the latest developments of physical or virtual networks in cloud and container technology. You drive the further development of the network in our OpenStack-based cloud platform in the interest of customers and the OpenSource community.
This includes the following tasks:
You will be involved in the design, operation and further development of OpenStack-based services on the Open Telekom Cloud Platform in the network area in close contact with the manufacturers.
You plan and drive automation using common automation frameworks.
You further develop the physical and virtual network architecture, taking IT security aspects into account.
You will work together with specialists from our team and other Deutsche Telekom teams on the technology topics of public cloud, open source and security.
You will prepare materials for presentations and advise management on technology decisions.
As a senior architect you will work in an agile based squad and supporting other colleagues is part of the journey.
Requirements:
Degree in computer science, mathematics, a technical, engineering or natural science subject or a comparable vocational training with many years of professional experience.
3-5 years of professional experience in the ICT sector, ideally with a focus on modern Cloud technologies (Public Clouds, preferably OpenStack-based, or Docker or Kubernetes).
Ability to understand Low Level Design and be able to work with it.
Willingness to create proof-of-concepts with the help of necessary scripting languages and other tools for testing the concepts in practice.
Excellent ability to assess technical solutions individually.
Make the necessary decisions when solving incidents and any kind of tasks.
Agile mindset.
Fluent English, both written and spoken.
Feeling comfortable in a multicultural environment
Proven record of deep knowledge in physical networking and IT Security (Routers, Switches, Firewalls) is a plus
Past experience with OpenSource projects is a plus.
Very good knowledge of Linux Networking (Open vSwitch) is a plus.
Experience with Automation e.g. with Ansible. Is a plus
Location
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, P√©cs

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.

The largest ICT employerin Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH)is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sitesin Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Senior Engineer Security and Forensics (OTC) - REF761L
The Public Cloud Portfolio Unit operates on a national and international level, for medium-sized and large companies. We develop, market and operate agile, cloud-native, forward-looking products and services for the digital world. We see ourselves as innovation drivers and make our customers' business fit for the digital future. Our mission: Together with our customer, shaping the safest, easiest, and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future.
Your Department:
We run Open Telekom Cloud! Open Telekom Cloud is a public cloud standard product based on open source community software and driven by principles of DevSecOps. Lean structures, agile methods, highly motivated teams and an extremely dynamic business environment determine our actions. With this customer-oriented and agile orientation, we are the anchor point for the Public Cloud business in Deutsche Telekom Group.
We are measured by delivering a secure, stable and innovative platform. We work jointly with our platform partner and other partners out of the OpenStack ecosystem to create a highly innovative public cloud product based on European security and data protection standards.
We are looking for people who are professionals and evangelists with a great deal of enthusiasm for cloud technology and who are up to the challenges created by the development and operation of a hyper-scale public cloud.
We offer a unique insight into how a large public cloud works under the hood, intercultural teamwork, flat hierarchies and an independent working-style.
Your Tasks:
As a¬†"Senior Security Engineer Public Cloud (OTC)" you understand the latest developments in the field of Security & Cloud.
Design and implement security strategies to protect networks and data resources.
Plan computer and network security, investigate and test hardware and software for vulnerabilities.
Respond to intrusions.
Being responsible for the¬†IT-Security of the backend of the 2nd largest public cloud in Europe¬†
Working closely together with our Security Operations Center (SOC).
Do you like?
Be a trusted advisor on information and IT security.
Work in a team of specialists where everyone helps each other in an open and trusting manner.
Implementing security measurements and processes.
Preventively perform penetration tests and actively preventing attacks.
Your Profile:¬†
Completed studies in a technical, engineering or scientific subject or comparable professional training.
3-5 years of professional experience in IT ideally with cloud security.
Relevant certification in IT security, such as CEH, CCSP, CISSP, etc.
Hands-on experience with averted attacks
Knowledge of relevant scanning/assessment tools.
Strong experience in Linux and network related services.
High level of customer focus.
Knowledge of agile development processes.
Fluency in written and spoken English. German is a plus
You will be working in the European Union to meet our customers' data security and privacy requirements.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Azure DevOps Engineer (REF1580B)
Who are we looking for and what you will do?
As an Azure experienced engineer, you will use your creativity and problem-solving skills to further enhance an existing Azure-centered product used by business customers
You will design, optimize, and develop a complex set of business services. You further develop this solution procedurally and technologically
Be prepared for changing the existing solution using your creative thinking and problem-solving skills so that it becomes even more useful to both, our customers and stakeholders internal to Deutsche Telekom, our parent company
Together with a team of bright thinkers and doers, you continuously automate our solution so that human intervention becomes largely unnecessary
You have state-of-the-art knowledge in the software engineering process and are committed to further developing the quality of software development
You integrate our solution with third-party solutions via API, e.g. Service Now
You believe that documentation is key and act accordingly
What are we looking for in you?
If you are sufficiently brave to deal with complex interconnected systems within an international blue chip‚Äôs ecosystem, you know PowerShell, REST API, JSON, and Python, then you are the right person for the job.
You are a perfect match if you are flexible regarding the diverse nature of tasks that might come up, you love to learn and develop your skills, and you have the appetite to innovate
You have up-to-date coding and scripting experience in any of these areas: JSON, PowerShell, REST API, .NET, Python, shell scripting
You are fluent in spoken and written English, German helpful, and like to work with colleagues in different time zones
Microsoft Azure and Azure DevOps is your home turf
You are interested in contributing to our sales strategy with a big empathy for putting our customers on a fast track to Azure
You have an agile mindset and are experienced with agile working methods, e. g. Scrum
You will be working closely with a team of phantastic Azure experts and be part of a larger international team of programmers and architects.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
DevOps Engineer - Networking field (REF222U)
Tasks
Full definition, preparation (High and low level lab design), follow-up, validation and documentation of test results
Test and measuring devices and lab infrastructure requirements and test automation by scripts
Using of Network Domain Orchestratorrel Automation
Gradual involvement in network planning, Review design documents from Planning or Engineering, modify and improve for lab architecture¬†
Configuration, customizing, and implementation of customized solutions for projects
Analysis of functional and technical requirements for software, platforms, and infrastructure¬†
Technical support of test projects¬†
Maintenance of planning and design documentation¬†
Participation in projects for the whole life cycle of the projects¬†
Description/Creation/Revision of test cases Automation of test cases Specification of product features environment ( Phython)
FTTB, BNG based L2/L3 based mass market and individual products (Skills: Gherkin/Cucumber)¬†
Skills (minimum 4 from these):
Cisco CCNP exam or equivalent knowledge and relevant experience
Juniper exam or experience
English intermediate level
Openness to new network technologies
Gherkin and Cucumber knowhow
Phython, Java , Javascript knowhow
Basic knowhow about Test Automation Framework (TAF)
Accurate and thorough work, inclination to learn, teamwork¬†
Jira, Gitlab, Docker knowhow or relevant experience
CI/CD knowhow
Jason/ Kubernetes knowhow or relevant experience
SQL database knowhow
Vmware experience
¬†Advantages:
Experience in agile methodology
German (B2 level) or willingness to learn german

Lead Designer in Test & Operations automation (REF1534Q) (Budapest)
Lead Designer in Test & Operations automation (REF1534Q) (Budapest)

Would you like to join to a team, where you can contribute with your experiences to an end to end procedure in testing, automation and operations activities of innovative network technologies?¬†This is your turn now! Come and join us¬†and be the part of an exciting journey towards Magenta world!¬†Join our international company and help us to create value for one of the biggest and most important projects in Deutsche Telekom Group. Being part of our team, you will have an impact on our 30 million Customers, who will use our products and services.
Lead Designer in Test & Operations automation (REF1534Q)
Tasks
In EMS Team of DTT we are continuing, expanding, and developing the first automation steps and adapting them in order to increase quality in validation, rollout and operation.
Collecting and understanding the client needs and translate them into technical language
Develop strategy, architecture, concept and design of automation (operations, tests of EMS of one of major network vendors + reusable for others)
Organize, structure, plan and prioritize their implementation steps
Create sustainable, maintainable and modular solution
The implementation and development should be actively accompanied, and these should also be used in parts, e.g. in the active participation in the test environment
Supplementation, expansion and automation of existing processes / mechanisms not automated by the manufacturer
Goals:
Increase quality in validation, rollout and operation
Shorten lead times
Improve software quality through higher test coverage
Increase transparency
Create reusable solution
Requirements
Ability to develop sustainable and well maintainable design approaches and criteria
Security-by-design - very strong awareness of data protection and security in general and, in particular, in the automation environment
Frameworks: Postman, Ansible, ReadyAPI, Behave, VS Code, etc
Programming languages YAML, Python, Gherkin, json, bash, etc.
Jira, Git
Linux
English and German knowledge¬†communication level
Strong communication skills with a distributed team (in Germany) using various technical means, but also willingness to communicate personally with team members
Good to have:
Experience as ‚Äúfixed access‚Äù network engineer, to have clear understanding of the subject area

AWS Cloud Migration Architect (REF1547Q) (Budapest)

Jelentkezem az √°ll√°sra ‚Ä∫

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
AWS Cloud Migration Architect (REF1547Q)
About us¬†
‚ÄãIn the AWS Cloud Adoption Team (CAT), we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it‚Äôs a transition from different Cloud or it‚Äôs their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.
Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest, and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.
Your Tasks
As the AWS Migration Architect, you will be responsible for ensuring the Cloud adoption strategy by defining the cloud adoption roadmap aligned with the target platform solution design, business strategies and the existing landscape environment. You will be responsible for creating the optimal migration journey by leveraging TSI standards as well as cloud native tooling and processes. You will be also contributing to creation and improvement of the migration scenarios, set of best practices, and leveraging Zero Touch approach wherever possible.¬† As AWS Migration Architect, it will be in your responsibility to manage the engagement with cloud service providers through the build and run phases to ensure that customer achieves maximum value from cloud initiatives and services.
Implement complex customer requirements in technical solutions in accordance with best practices, cost-efficiency and future security based on Amazon Web Services (AWS)
Develop both High-Level and Low-Level design for all possible variations of migration or transformation to hybrid cloud products (private/public) based on AWS
Optimize all onboarding scenarios for customers on private & public cloud together with 3rd party products for migration
Cooperate with the product owner on the continuous development of the T-systems cloud adoption portfolio
Collaborate with sales on preparation of complex customer inquiries and tenders
Be an advisor for local and international customers on optimal cloud adoption strategies
Collaborate directly with end customers, with T-systems partners and international teams
Create, define and improve processes and plans related to migration¬†
Your Profile
We are looking for an individual with strong background in public cloud technologies who is ready to help customers on their migration journey to public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:
5+ years of relevant work experience with AWS cloud technologies and/or field relevant certification (Professional and/or Specialty)
A deep technical understanding of public cloud technologies and practical experience in public cloud adoption and migration
Experience with advocating and implementing Cloud Adoption Frameworks on AWS, MAP, MRE, MPA and other meaningful best practices
A can-do attitude which helps you to stand out in a fail fast culture
Passion to work in a global and diverse organization and environment
Excellent presentation and communication skills (spoken and written English)
Familiarity with application discovery tools and cloud migration software is an asset
Some experience with Agile tooling and processes
Experience with Infrastructure as Code and automation possibilities (ex. Terraform)
Experience with Version Control Systems (GitLab)

Java Architect - Software Architect - PLM area (REF399Q)
Did you know that car and airplane manufacturing systems collect data about literally everything what is in a factory and is related directly or indirectly to the delivered products? You can find all the mechanical details of the used screws, bearings, sheet material and even toilet paper.
In your role you would be part of an international software development team providing such Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) solutions for major European automotive and aeronautic manufacturers, who are thriving to produce more reliable and economical products.
As a Java/Software Architect you will 
Design new features based on customer‚Äôs demands
Manage feature development including task estimation, concept presentation and communication with the development team,
Get insight and develop different PLM related applications,
Utilize your development experiences to ensure that customer requirements of security, data Recoverability and integrity are met,
Have to find solutions for everyday software challenges ‚Äì let it be technical or performance
Deliver application releases to test and production environments
As a member of our team, on this job you will build your expertise in the fields of
Java Solution Design with other Java Experts/Architects
Designing feature developments
Customer Consulting
Requirements Management
Working in an international development team
Review Deliverables and Code of the development team
Analyzing arising application issues
As a candidate you have to have
Significant experience as a Senior Java Developer or Java/Software Architect
Confident appearance and communication skills (customer friendliness)
Structured way of working
Analytical Skills
Knowledge of Agile project methods such as Scrum / Kanban
Very good English language skills
As an outstanding candidate, beyond the basics, 
you would have experience with
cloud technologies like MS Azure, AWS or Google Cloud
different Java versions like 8 and above
CI and CD tools like Jenkins, Teamcity or GitLab
working with both NoSQL databases such as Mongo, Cassandra and RDBMS such as DB2
Atlassian products like Jira and Confluence
or you
know any PLM software or have some experience in production support area
are familiar with German language
Location
Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs, Szeged

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Operation Manager Agile (PowerBI) (REF1406L)
We are looking for¬†you¬†as Operations Manager Agile to support our team for operations with a focus on PowerBI!
If you would like to work on tasks below, don't hesitate to apply!
Operations and Engineering for Power Platform
Creating, reading and evaluating monitoring information of the Power BI Platform (number of API requests, connection via On DataGateway etc)
Monitoring of the PowerBI Platform with the help of the Center of Execllent Starter Kit
Creation and implementation of own reporting for the evaluation of operational monitoring information
Knowledge of the Power BI infrastructure (Power BI Shared, Premium, embedded), creation of simple data sources and workspaces
Knowledge of connecting OnPrem DataGateway, incl. troubleshooting and monitoring of operating parameters
Basic knowledge in creating reports
Implementing architecture concepts on the PowerBI infrastructure
Performing administrative tasks on PowerBI, such as creating workspaces, assigning licences, etc.
Troubleshooting the Power BI infrastructure together with customer representatives.
Communication with Microsoft support
You can apply to this position, if you have some experience in using all of the following tools:
Experience and knowledge in the Microsoft technology world¬†
Basic experience in Office / M365, at least as a user of the services
Understanding in user management of M365. Azure ActiveDirectory / use of AzureActive Directory groups
Basic knowledge of PowerShell, such as installing modules, running scripts
Basic knowledge of Cloud ( SaaS, PaaS, IaC etc)
Basic knowledge of Azure.Cloud technology¬†(-> what is sub scripting, what is VM etc..)
Languages: English; German is an advantage

DevOps Engineer-Optical Field (REF1457C)
Being part of the project team for providing the orchestration solution for fulfilment and operations. Focusing on journey to deliver the automated testing pipeline for the integration testing activities. Engineering teams collaborate in small, specialized squads for either general platform improvement or development of new value-added features following an agile process.
Tasks:
Design, develop and execute automated quality of software activities.
Managing activities in resolving issues raised to achieve a solution.
Conducts of performance analyses and tunings as well as error analyses and troubleshooting.
Setup the automated integration testing process.
The process shall realize validation of software modules for the orchestration platform in phases of acceptance testing, integration, and deployment to production.
Requirements
Being enabler for the integration testing team collaboration with the Product Owner and the development team focusing on DevOps.
Knowledge of validation processes, using DevOps tools for CICD environment such as GitLab.
Hands-on software testing experience for Behave, Gherkin, Mountebank.
Hands-on software experience for Python.
Practical knowledge of virtualisation and containers with focus on Kubernetes.
Vertical knowledge of technology solutions and ability to learn, understand, and work quickly within the Telecommunications technology space for Optical Transport Networks Domain is the plus.
Degree in Computer Science or a related technical field or equivalent practical experience.
Languages:
English ‚Äì Communicative with fluent technical vocabulary.
German ‚Äì Nice to have.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Citrix System Administrator (REF676D)
Tasks
Installing and maintaining Microsoft Windows and Windows Server environments.
Changing and customizing of the existing environment based on customer requests.
Ticket handling and resolving on 2nd and 3rd level.
Managing and maintaining Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops environments from small customers to Enterprise scale.
Manage, coordinate, and implement application installations, upgrades and patches for applications running in the Citrix Virtual Desktop Agent machines.
Analyze, troubleshoot and fix technical issues related to the Citrix environment and/or applications provided via Citrix.
Managing and maintaining Citrix Hypervisor Clusters.
Managing and maintaining Citrix Application Delivery Controller environments.
Requirements:
Experience in Microsoft technologies/Microsoft Windows and Windows Server environments and project work
Upper intermediate English
Participate in On-Call
Willingness to learn Citrix
Advantages:
Experience in Active Directory, Windows Registry
Experience in virtualization (Citrix, Vmware, Hyper-V, etc..)
Basic Cloud Computing Solutions (Citrix preferred)¬†
Citrix Xenapp solution knowledge (Xenapp 7.15 )
Xendesktop solution knowledge¬†
Netscaler solution knowledge
MSI technology
ITIL knowledge (with cert)
Certification in Windows 10 (welcome, but purely optional)
At least 1 year experience in multinational environment
Basic German¬†language knowledge
Multiple
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

IT Architect for Software Engineering (REF1356U)
As an¬†IT Architect for Software Engineering¬†you are defining and improving the existing tool chains to support the defined SE process standards.¬†The main driver for your daily business is to satisfying our colleagues working on our infrastructure to deliver complex and secure applications with high quality to external customers. At least 5 years of practice in programming of applications with Java or similar programming language including deep Unix knowledge.¬†Knowledge in different project models like classic approach, agile methods (e.g. Scrum,¬†SAFe, ...) and DevOps¬†Good experience with tools and frameworks supporting the SE process¬†¬†Software engineering tools like Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, CI pipelines with Jenkins, Test tool like Xray.¬†¬†In addition you have an idea not as an expert, but you see the lever of moderns frameworks and approaches for test automation or Infrastructure as Code (IoC) like Docker, Ansible, Helm, Kubernetes.¬†Knowledge about measuring process performance with KPIs¬†High team and communication skills, ability of consulting¬†Language skills in English,‚ÄØfluent‚ÄØverbal and‚ÄØwritten‚ÄØ¬†

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.¬†
DevOps Engineer EDG (TECHNIK HU/ VNI) (REF216Y)
Tasks
Develop and use software solutions and specify IP access and IP service functions for integration in a heterogeneous system environment
¬†Accompany and control the technical implementation of these functions in national and international projects
Design and implement standards for system tests and test automation in E2E responsibility and with the aim of ensuring a high degree of automation
Requirements
Network knowledge (PPP, Ethernet, DHCP RADIUS / DIAMETER, SNMP), know-how on IP platforms JunOS, Cisco IOS
Knowledge of the standard routing protocols
Experience with network protocols (Telnet, SSH, NetConf) and knowledge of IP network technology (e.g. IP, MPLS, VPN)
Ability to use common development tools (Shell, Git, GitLab)
Creation of test concepts and documentation
Knowledge of FMIP

angol - k√∂z√©pfok√∫
The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.

The largest¬†ICT employer¬†in Hungary,¬†Deutsche¬†Telekom¬†IT¬†Solutions¬†(formerly¬†IT-Services Hungary,¬†ITSH)¬†is¬†a¬†subsidiary of the¬†Deutsche¬†Telekom¬†Group. Scrum Master (Open Telecom Cloud) - REF1555S
The Public Cloud Portfolio Unit operates on a national and international level, for medium-sized and large companies. We develop, market and operate agile, cloud-native, forward-looking products and services for the digital world. We see ourselves as innovation drivers and make our customers' business fit for the digital future. Our mission: Together with our customer, shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future.
Your Department
We run Open Telekom Cloud! Open Telekom Cloud is a public cloud standard product based on open source community software and driven by principles of DevSecOps. Lean structures, agile methods, highly motivated teams and an extremely dynamic business environment determine our actions. With this customer-oriented and agile orientation, we are the anchor point for the Public Cloud business in Deutsche Telekom Group.
We are measured by delivering a secure, stable and innovative platform. We work jointly with our platform partner and other partners out of the OpenStack ecosystem to create a highly innovative public cloud product based on European security and data protection standards.
We are looking for people who are professionals and evangelists with a great deal of enthusiasm for cloud technology and who are up to the challenges created by the development and operation of a hyper-scale public cloud.
We offer a unique insight into how a large public cloud works under the hood, intercultural teamwork, flat hierarchies, and an independent working-style.
Your Tasks
As a "Scrum Master" you understand the latest developments in agile software development in close integration with operations (DevSecOps). You enable teams to continuously increase their success.
You want:
- Accompany and coach agile teams to promote agile thinking patterns.
¬†Support the product owner of a squad in an agile environment by identifying potential obstacles early on and actively removing them.
¬†Maintain an overview of processes, communication, and motivation within the team.
¬†Engage in improving overarching processes and structures.
¬†Work in a community where everyone helps each other in an open and trusting manner.
Your Profile 
-¬† Completed studies in a technical, engineering or business subject or comparable professional training.
¬†3-5 years of experience as Scrum Master.
¬†Familiar with Agile methods (Kanban, Scrum, etc) and project methonds (SAFe, RTE, etc)
¬†High customer orientation.
¬†Certification as Scrum Master.
¬†Practice with agile methods, development processes and software tools.
¬†You are a team player, people person and are burning to make a difference.
¬†Experience as a coach is a plus.
¬†Fluency in written and spoken English.
You will be working in the European Union to meet our clients' data security and privacy requirements.
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Cloud Architect (Open Telecom Cloud) - REF1377P
As a¬†"Cloud Architect"¬†you understand the latest developments of physical or virtual networks in cloud and container technology. You drive the further development of the network in our OpenStack-based cloud platform in the interest of customers and the OpenSource community.This includes the following tasks:You will be involved in the design, operation and further development of OpenStack-based services on the Open Telekom Cloud Platform in the network area in close contact with the manufacturers.You plan and drive automation using common automation frameworks.You further develop the physical and virtual network architecture, taking IT security aspects into account.You will work together with specialists from our team and other Deutsche Telekom teams on the technology topics of public cloud, open source and security.You will prepare materials for presentations and advise management on technology decisions.As a senior architect you will work in an agile based squad and supporting other colleagues is part of the journey.

Solution Engineer
Tasks:
You will work closely with requirements managers (e.g. product owners) in the analysis and implementation of requirements and also provide advice at management level
You create software solution designs and take care of their documentation
You define standards for system tests /test automation and take over the installation and configuration of software for complex products and services
You work closely with other teams in an international environment and lead projects
You work in technology on the programming of operational IT systems
Programming operational IT systems developed in DT Technik

Experience in classical and agile forms of cooperation or methodologies

System Validation Engineer (REF1539Z)
2/3 part of the job:Acceptance of HW/SW in the Intraselect Foundation environment (CPE and Core).Automation of acceptance testsDesign, implementation and deployment of the stable acceptance environment for Intraselect Foundation and SD-WANTransfer of the knowledge gained during the acceptance tests in the classic IP VPN environment to the functional tests in the SD-WAN environmentIntegration of new techniques/technologies into the acceptance (PIU (with Toolchain 2.0), universal CPE (uCPE))Documentation and desing of myWIki articles.1/3 part of job:Coordinating the releases of the featuresquads (especially GCS, VPN), writing the releaseletter on behalf of the featuresquads.Planning release tests based on Cisco Lifecycle Policy as well as the relevant contracts between Telekom and Cisco (especially GFA)Prioritization of the tests based on the inventory (Service Assurance on the side of DTBS (CPE'n), Supersquad PISE (shared Components, Core))

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Junior Solution Engineer - Container Operation (REF942I)
If you have a passion for technology, and would like to participate in daily operation, have deep familiarity with open source, Kubernetes, container technology and Linux, then you will love this job. The experience you will gain within our team, provides you an opportunity to move on to advanced DevOps in the future.
Let‚Äôs have a look at on your regular tasks:
Agile methodology based support using Service NOW and HP Service Manager9
Daily Standups
Various technologies, like: Ansible, Container (Rancher, OpenShift), Shell/Python scripting, Linux platforms, Kubernetes, GitLab, Prometheus
Participation in customer and vendor calls
Solving complex problems, doing Root Cause Analysis
Capacity planning, performance tuning, optimization related activities
Knowledge sharing
System development, bugfix, code review, documentation
Requirements:
College/university degree or equivalent certificates/work experience
Fluent verbal and written communication skills in English¬†
IT Operational experience (min. 1-2 years)
Experience in Container operations
Solving problems with script languages
Advantages:¬†
Agile methodology knowledge (eg. Scrum, Kanban board)
Container based technology knowhow (Docker, Rancher, Kubernetes)
Automation, IAC experience (Ansible)
Python or other scripting language
Public or private cloud experience (min. 1-2 years)
German language knowledge
Personality:¬†
Systemic thinking
Customer focused attitude
Motivation for self-development with granted tools
Location
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, P√©cs

The largest ICT employerin Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH)is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sitesin Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
ServiceNow Business Analyst (REF189R)
The role has opened due to ever growing international business demands. As a Business Analyst your main responsibility is to analyze business and IT requirements, processes; understand the as-is situation and translate the inputs into solutions based on ServiceNow platform that fulfill the requirements. Your tasks will range from understanding the client‚Äôs requirements through applying industry best practices and detailed knowledge of ServiceNow in designing an optimal solution (processes, data models, workflows, etc.) to supporting the actual implementation with story writing and testing in Agile frameworks.¬†
Your tasks
Understanding client and business requirements, creating specifications and documentations (via meeting, document analysis, workshops, etc.)
Providing analysis and modeling for company-wide business processes, ability to deduce needs from business operation and realize IT development potentials
Providing process design to standardize organization‚Äôs workflows and business operation while utilizing industry best practices and ServiceNow OOB recommendation and features
Helping the collaboration between customers and IT development team. Conducting professional consultation with architects, project managers, team leaders, technical leads, developers and testers
Working with multiple complex systems on a wide range area, supporting integration designs¬†
Creating documentation, training materials and other supporting materials post-implementation to help transition and acceptance of the platform by customer‚Äôs end users¬†
Supporting proposal and concept creation in IT migration and helping with transition projects
Requirements:
1-2 years of experience in business analysis, consultancy, requirement gathering & specifications or similar roles
Experience with ServiceNow (at least as an end user)
Strong oral and written communication skills (both business English and Hungarian)
Ability to work in an international environment with local and international teams
Experience implementing systems using the Agile/Scrum methodology including client requirement analysis and system design
Experience designing and implementing IT and Non-IT related process workflows, procedures based on technical standards and best practices
Experience in test plan creation and execution as well as provide guidance for key users, preparation of corporate knowledge articles and conducting trainings
Personal qualities: strong analytical skills, creativity, innovation, passion, eagerness for self-development and a good sense of humor would come in handy working with us, IT geeks
Nice to have skills and capabilities
Hands-on experience with ServiceNow configuration and administration¬†
Working proficiency in German language
Great presentation skills
ServiceNow certification (CSA or others)
Presales experience, working with RfX proposals
¬†ITIL Foundation certification¬†
Experience with MS Visio and other BPM tools
Junior

Content developer in e-learning/Instructional designer - REF570E (Budapest)
Content developer in e-learning/Instructional designer - REF570E (Budapest)
A hirdet√©s m√°r lej√°rt!
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvet≈ë elv√°r√°sok
IT, telekommunik√°ci√≥
3 - 5 √©v tapasztalat

Fels≈ëfok√∫ v√©gzetts√©g
