Present in the market under the¬†Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions¬†brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Content developer in e-learning/Instructional designer - REF570E
As an E-learning content writer / Instructional Designer, you will be responsible for designing and developing digital learning content using the latest learner-centric and most innovative methods.¬†
In this role, you will develop and update e-courses, learning activities, assessments and deliver training to various stakeholders, supporting our teams acquire product and domain knowledge that they need to thrive in their roles.
You will have the unique opportunity to work with our thought leaders and help to transform our proprietary knowledge into best-in-class and innovative learning experiences for self-paced learning.
Roles and Responsibilities
Development of new training concepts and ideas using various methodologies and didactic approaches for learning products, eg. videos, e-courses, learning journeys.
Designs and structures interactive training content for our technical or non-technical learners using instructional design.
Using instructional design principles and best practice.
Prepare storyboards, build learning content (text, pictures, instructions, exercises, etc.) from source files.
Collaborate with subject matter experts in the course of development.
Implement feedback received from experts.
Use authoring tools such as Articulate Rise and Storyline.
Participate in any phase of e-learning development process.
Cooperation with other specialists, subject matter experts and business leaders.
Utilize game-based learning and keep up to date with new developments in the online training industry.
Iteratively prototype and test learning solutions to ensure they deliver value.
Skills:
MA in English or German languages and min 3-5 years of teaching experience
Strong knowledge of didactic and adult learning principles
Ability to understand information on various topics and work with text
Attention to detail
Ability and willingness to learn
Experience with video making tools (eg Camtasia), e-learning tools and software (Articulate or other)
OUR OFFER
Opportunity to participate in creating international programmes
Great international team and informal start-up atmosphere
Strong company culture and team spirit
Opportunity to learn and improve technical and soft skills
Possibilities for career development
Home office
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Experienced

The largest ICT employerin Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH)is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sitesin Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Data Engineer for IoT (REF1449L)
We are operating a mobile communication platform for M2M (machine to machine) devices. For this we are looking for 3rd level supporter. Typical tasks are:Incident troubleshootingPerformance tuningPlatform optimizationThe platform consists components like ORACLE databases, Elastic Search, Rabbit MQ, SOA, JBoss, Tomcat all based on LINUX servers + customized SW products from 2 vendors. ¬†The supporter we are locking for should have a common understanding of these components and deep knowledge of ORACLE DB and LINUX (shell and scripting).Also knowledge of mobile communication is needed to understand the whole end to end process which is necessary for troubleshooting ¬†and optimization.The supporter must act in an international team independently and responsible. He must also organize virtual meetings with other departments and SW vendors, to manage issues and measures.
General:Good communication skillsEnglish min. B2Independent, structured and responsible working style¬†Team player (also in distributed, international teams)Expert in the areas of incident / problem / change and projectsSQL:ORACLE SQL/PL-SQL skills with many years of experienceExperience with very large databasesDB analysesperformance tuningCreating scripts, testing scripts (also complex ones)UNIX/Linux:UNIX/Linux knowledge with many years of experienceMastery of UNIX commands and toolsConfident handling on shell level (understand, create, modify shell scripts)Jobs + permissionsExperience in network/server operation (interfaces, networks, storage)Networks:Fundamentals of network technologiesProgramming:Programming experience (ideally Python or Java / no expert knowledge).Mobile Communications:Experience in the operation of mobile OSS/BSS (RAN not essential)Ideally, experience in rating and billing
Expert
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
German speaking IT Security Advisor (REF1513T)
As an "IT Security Advisor" you need to understand and monitor the latest common vulnerabilities and exposures (CVE) in the field of IT Security in order to support the clients preventing eventual cyber attacks, security breaches and data breaches. If you are eager to analyze and assess newest cyber risks and are ready to be a trusted advisor of remediation measures, join our Cyber Threat Intelligence Team!
Main responsibilities will be:
Creating vulnerability reports as well as analysis and evaluation of the respective subject
Compiling professional messages for our newsletter subscribers as well as analysis and evaluation of the respective subject
Taking over daily responsibilities of continuous research of contents worthy of reporting, compilation of reports, quality assurance and dispatch
Regular updating of documentation (e.g. work instructions, manuals, customer documentation)
Processing of customer requests in different ticketing systems
Requirements
Completed studies in a technical, engineering or scientific subject
Minimum 2 years of professional experience in IT security
Fluency both in German AND English languages
General knowledge of Internet security, networking protocols, and related technologies
High level of customer focus
Analytical thinking
Exceptional communication skills in writing
Advantages
Any level of IT Security certificate(s) (CompTIA, EC-Council, CISA/CISM, CISSP, etc)

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Quality Manager - IT Software Development Project (REF1404I)
performing deal checks by assessing customer deals before submissonplanning and cunducting quality gates (checking compliance against IT software development standards) and participating project auditsensure closing of findings identified during Q-Gates, and identify lessons learnedcollaboration in risk, overrun and claim managementweekly / monthly review of status of project/service and communication to the stakeholders, identifying risks then initiating and tracking of Back to green plans.coaching of deal, project and service teams concerning T-Systems standardssupport of internal and external audits (Management Audits, ISO, CMMI, SPICE)
very good IT project management and service management skills, as well as practical experience necessarymore than 10 years of background in IT Quality Management process is requiredvery deep knowledge of the standards of IT projects and application services (PM-, SE-, SM-Book) is a mustexcellent german and good english language skills necessaryand being able to enforce his/her requirements as well as supporting continuous improvements of corporate standards, processes and tools of software development¬†high team and communication skillsproactivity, ability to make progress without supervision

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Network Automation Engineer (REF1561J)
DNA (Drive Network Automation) is an initiative which unites several projects which are building a technology-savvy platform used across different instances and domains intended for automation and orchestration of network elements, services and network functions. MDO stands for MultiDomain Orchestrator - the platform that orchestrates networks across various domains.
We are looking for Network Engineers with different level of telecommunication experience from juniors to architects, who are interested in joining the team of leading industry experts driving Network Automation and Orchestration initiatives within Deutsche Telekom and its subsidiary national telecom operators
Tasks
Experience in defining and maintaining complex data models
Experience in object-oriented programming with Python or similar languages
Experience in developing of restful API‚Äôs (e.g. TMF‚Ä¶)
Version management of software and configuration artifacts (e.g. GIT, MCICD‚Ä¶)
Good knowledge of the conception and development of automation technologies and solutions (orchestration, service modelling).
Basic knowledge of networking (e.g. WAN / LAN / routing / 5G slicing)
Application (software packages and configurations)
Container (software packages and configurations)
Knowledge of operational processes in a telco: in fulfillment, assurance, operation support & readiness, ITIL processes
Technical understanding of telecommunications infrastructure
Service & Resource Lifecycle Management
English spoken and written (Level B2)
Advantages:
Data and status models according to e.g. TMF-SID
Markup languages such as YAML, JSON
Description standards such as TOSCA, YANG Experience in configuration of key telecommunication service processes: OSR, assurance and fulfilment in modern transport networks
Test-Driven development (TDD)
Model based Automation
Workflow (e.g. BPMN, CAMUNDA)
DevOps mindset
German language

Process Manager - Software engineering (REF541Q) (Budapest)

Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions

The largest¬†ICT employer¬†in Hungary,¬†Deutsche¬†Telekom¬†IT¬†Solutions¬†(formerly¬†IT-Services Hungary,¬†ITSH)¬†is¬†a¬†subsidiary of the¬†Deutsche¬†Telekom¬†Group. Established¬†in 2006, the company provides¬†a¬†wide portfolio of¬†IT¬†and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees.¬†ITSH was¬†awarded with the Best¬†in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA¬†in 2019,¬†acknowledged¬†as one of the most¬†attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs¬†independent survey¬†in 2021¬†and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company¬†in 2019. The company continuously develops¬†its four sites¬†in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs¬†and Szeged¬†and¬†is looking for skilled¬†IT¬†professionals to join¬†its team.
Process Manager - Software engineering (REF541Q)
As a Process Manager - Software engineering you define the standards for SW Engineering in T-Systems.
You describe the SE standards in a SE Book and deploy process changes to the employees via various channels. E.g. according to inCar development demands, standard compliance (Safety, Security) or to apply to common agreed standards in software engineering like ISO, CMMI, Automotive Spice.
A continuous improvement process (CIP) has great meaning to you, therefore you ask for process improvements suggestion from the delivery units to develop the SE standards of the company.
You observe to which extend the projects follow the defined standards, monitor the standard compliance of the projects with key performance indicators (KPI) and SE Quality Checks, support external formal audits (CMMI, A-SPICE, ISO) as SE single point of contact, and help the projects by performing their CIP. You develop and improve the established KPI set to enhance the quality of our project‚Äôs deliveries more and more.
We also support the standards with 2 defined DevOps tool chains (Intranet and Public Cloud). Your task is also to define how to adapt the different tools in their configuration or in establishing interfaces, plugins to follow the defined standards.
The combination of both, on one hand the process management scope and on the other hand the link to the tool infrastructure makes the job interesting and challenging.
You work in committees and communities to share your knowledge and experiences with colleagues and gain from other employees vice versa.
Requirements
At least 5 years of experience in development projects with product modelling relevance
Experience in performing Quality Checks like Q-Gates or Assessments to check compliance with Software Engineering Standards and identify risks
Experience in CMMI and/or A-SPICE
Ability as Process Manager to model and implement processes
High team and communication skills, ability of consulting
Knowledge in different project models like classic approach, agile methods (e.g. Scrum) and DevOps
Possible background knowledge in the automotive sector
Language skills in English,¬†fluent¬†in¬†spoken¬†and¬†written¬†
Knowledge measuring process performance with KPIs

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.¬†
Technical Incident Manager (REF84R)
Tasks:
Lead and coordinate CBI High/Critical incident resolution / Conduct Root Cause Analysis (RCA)
Manage lifecycle of incident / problem tickets
Initiate and lead technical conference calls
Coordinate efforts of all involved parties, including suppliers and external teams
Initiate and drive internal and external escalation procedures
Create and distribute Incident / RCA reports to key stakeholders
Make recommendations for process and quality improvements
Set and track measures for process and quality improvement activities
Agent for special, management driven escalations / topics
Requirements:
German: B2/C1
English: B2/C1
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
German and English Speaking Service Delivery Manager (IT Security) (REF1276Y)
In this position, you will have the overall responsibility for the quality and compliance of our operations, as Deutsche Telekom Security, in accordance with the agreed contracts towards our existing customers and seek out new business opportunities with them.¬†
Tasks:
You will supervise contract fulfilment and contribute to its optimization for both the customer and Deutsche Telekom Security and monitor factors, which influence them.
You shall establish and refine processes to provide consistently high levels of customer service in a cost-effective manner as part of continuous improvement.
You will coordinate the collaboration of the relevant delivery units, their team leaders or OPMs to ensure daily operation and quick solution for issues that may arise.
You shall maintain a positive relationship with the customer representatives.
We offer a full time position to regular office hours.
You are excited to travel mostly around Europe
Skills:
You have a degree in economics of information management or adequate working experience in similar position.
You have an ITIL Foundation certificate and/or adequate working experience
You have a minimum of 3 years relevant working experience as a Service Delivery Manager.
You are fluent in English (both written and verbal at least B2)
You are fluent in German (both written and verbal at least C1)
You have a proven track of experience in contract management and negotiation
You possess distinctive project management skills, PMI or similar certification
You are knowledgeable of quality management methods
You have strong communication and presentation skills to Executive Management audience
Time management and prioritizing topics pose no issues to you
You have experience in the field of IT Security and are familiar with various products and services, which are in our portfolio
Advantages:
Experience in agile methodology/environment and mindset
Basic financial knowledge (e.g. forecasts, invoices, SAP)¬†
Fluent English (both written and verbal C1 or higher)
Fluent German (both written and verbal B2 or higher)
Experience with German customers with international location
Experience with international customers
You participated in transformation/transition projects in the IT/TC sector
You have experience with T-Systems internal tools
What our team can offer:¬†
Supportive, bondable team
Helpful colleagues in Germany (as your future direct contacts)
Our motto:¬†
‚ÄûSeriousness of work is compensated with enough levity.‚Äù
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Cloud Engineer - Linux (REF1144J)
Tasks:
Automation of IT processes according to cloud strategy of Deutsche Telekom on the environment of one of the biggest swiss customer
Responsibility for the entire lifecycle of the Linux server systems, as well as helping to shape the architecture (RHEL, SLES)
Engineering and 3rd level support of high-availability platforms with clustering & virtualization technologies
Create and maintain infrastructure solutions and Infrastructure as Code scripts
Conception, testing and implementation of customer-specific solutions
Participation in the further development of the container platforms (OpenShift, Rancher)
Skills:
Bachelor or Master‚Äôs degree in the following areas: Computer science, Engineering or Information Technology or equivalent work experience in IT
Strong knowledge in Linux server environments - Certified Linux Engineer (RHCE, SCE or similar certificates)
Basic knowledge and understanding of Microsoft environments (Azure) or other cloud technologies
Knowledge of automation (Ansible, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code)
Experience in setting up and operating container platforms (OpenShift, Rancher) is an advantage or knowledge of container technologies/concepts
Knowledge of scripting languages (Python, Bash)
Agile Mindset & Development, Experience in Agile Methodologies (SCRUM, SAFeScrum), Agile collaboration tools
Experience using GIT, JIRA platforms
Strong communication skills
Good knowledge of German (or understanding) or good English (spoken and written)
Strong customer orientation and pleasure in advising and working with our customer
Quality and goal-oriented, open minded, sociable and team-oriented personality

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Cloud Software Architect for Microsoft Azure (REF1512U)
Your job
You love to own a problem and are creative in resolving it in a scalable way, collaborating with a talented, really nice and honest team of cloud engineers
You enjoy creating functional and technical designs for cloud operations at scale, breaking them down for implementation by cloud engineers. This includes taking technological, architectural, and design decisions, often jointly with product owner, developers, and other stakeholders
You participate in software design meetings, creating architectural plans, gathering requirements and exploring edge cases
You see documentation of your designs as a useful method so engineers know what to implement and so we can refer to them later
You create high and detailed level designs, establishing proof of concept environment
You develope manual and automated landscape deployments and validations, integrating with CI/CD pipelines
When designing you always have the complete customer experience and set of services in mind (no customer-specific solutions)
You are not afraid of starting from scratch, and you are also good at improving existing implementations
You have state-of-the-art knowledge in the software engineering process and are committed to further developing the quality of software development
You can get the team behind your ideas while being open for others‚Äô ideas
You proactively drive the topics of the day, organise, and facilitate meetings
You see yourself at eye level with all team members and stakeholders, no matter who they are and where they come from, appreciating their respective expertise
You contribute to maintaining the product roadmap (customer-facing features as well as any technical debt)
You support our revenue contribution and OKR business goals
Your skills and profile
You are a perfect match if you love to dream big and take responsibility for making these dreams come true
You have an ownership mindset and a getting-things-done attitude
Systems thinking is your go-to approach
Microsoft Azure and Azure DevOps is your home turf
Deep understanding of the entire developement lifecycle (designing, developing, testing, deploying, monitoring)
Understanding of current software architecture and design patterns (clean architecture, microservices, etc)
You are really experienced in coding and scripting in PowerShell, Python and .NET
You value inner clarity as a means to make your point with confidence
Demonstrating knowledge by holding Proof Of Concepts, presenting on public events
You love to temporarily work directly with our customers
You are fluent in spoken and written English
You will be working in a phantastic international services development team.

Cyber Security Analyst Tier2 (REF196L)
Tasks
Perform detailed analyses and support Level1 team in daily operation
Security monitoring and other security operation activities
Generate reports for both technical and non-technical staff and stakeholders
Use advanced analytic tools to determine emerging threat patterns and vulnerabilities (EDR, NTA, Sandbox)
Requirements
At least 3 years of IT/Network Operations or IT Security experience
Technical knowledge of Internet security, networking protocols, and related technologies (Firewall IPS/IDS)
Basic understanding of Windows, Linux and network device monitoring and logging techniques
Basic understanding of host and network security hardening, networking protocols, common intrusion techniques and common risk management concepts
Basic understanding of Identity and Access Management concepts
Reliable English communication skills (speaking, writing and reading)
Basic Cloud security knowledge
Entry-level IT Security Certificate(s) (CompTIA, EC-Council or equivalent, Cisco)
Advantages
German communication skills
Experience with one or more well-known SIEM solution(s)
Experience with SOAR platform
Knowledge of Vulnerability Management
Vendor Certificates (IBM, Microsoft, Redhat or equivalent)
Any Advanced Security Certificate is big plus (GSEC, OSCP/OSCE or equivalent)

Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.

Are you passionate about software and about aviation? Do you love a technical challenge and like to work on multiple platforms to create a consistent experience for the consumers?
Our partner company has 30.000 employees worldwide. The company has a head office in Paris and Amsterdam and has several daughter companies. The group has over 550 aircraft and they are one of the bigger players in Europe. The developers they are hiring now will be working from Budapest, but fully part of the product teams.
The company has gone through a major restructuring over the last two years to adjust to the covid crisis. They are now implementing a strategic restructuring program in which one of the pillars is the Data &amp; Technology track. They have expressed the ambition to become the most data and tech-driven accompany in their sector. To do this, they are innovating and expanding and thus looking to attract more experts to the company.
Software Engineer
Feladatok
Specify, design, engineer, test, deliver, deploy, maintain and support digital products in order to optimally enable the improvement of business processes.
As a software developer, you now have the opportunity to join a new team in our partner company. However, there is already a team of developers working on the airline's internal applications in Amsterdam they are looking to involve those who join the new team in the development of new applications.
Our partner company is looking for an agile & objective-minded experienced developer with a pro-active mindset that is eager to learn new things.

thyssenkrupp is an international group of companies comprising largely independent industrial and technology businesses and employing 96,000 people. Across 48 countries it generated sales of ‚Ç¨41 billion in fiscal year 2021/22. Backed by extensive technological know-how, the businesses develop cost-effective and resource-friendly solutions to the challenges of the future, especially in the fields of climate protection, the energy transition, digital transformation in the industry and mobility of the future.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Application Administrator (REF1491J)
Tasks

Fundamental understanding of Architectures as NAT, Firewalls, Routing
Contact person for all questions regarding Infrastructure, central contact person for the operating departement
Usage of JIRA ‚Äì issue tracking, administrating
Forwarding the more complex problems to the next level of support
Delivery to the customer, occasionally customer contact
Working office hours without oncall duty

At least 1 year experience with SQL databases

Scrum Master - SAFe focus (REF365P) (Budapest)

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Scrum Master - SAFe focus (REF365P)
As "Scrum Master ", you will be responsible for supporting agile teams mainly according to SAFe methodology, organizing and leading agile ceremonies, keep close contact with Product Owner and agile team members, keep project administration up-to-date, using agile tools (JIRA, Confluence, Kanban Board etc) to keep agile teams on track.Your other responsibilities include:Leading the agile team in Servant-leadership style helps to collaborate and interact to maximize the value delivered by the scrum teamGuiding and coaching the agile team and organization on how to use Agile/Scrum practices and valuesSupporting the Product Owner, with special respect to refining and managing the product backlogAssessing the Scrum Maturity of the team and organization and coaching the team to higher levels of maturity, at a pace that is sustainable and comfortable for the team and organizationFacilitating discussion, decision-making, and conflict resolutionRemoving impediments and/or guiding the team to remove impediments
¬†Certified Scrum Master ‚Äì SAFe preferredAt least 3 years‚Äô experience as Scrum Master in international environmentFirm grasp of agile practices and ability to effectively manage and mentor development teamsExperience with different agile project management methodsExcellent interpersonal, project management, and problem-solving skillsStrong communication and presentation skillsTechnical and IT know-how and the willingness to familiarize yourself with the subject matterAbility to respond to customer needs with a high level of customer focus and social competenceProven ability in leadership, managing a diverse range of technical resourcesKnowledge of agile administration tools (eg. JIRA, Confluence, miro etc.)Advanced, business-fluent English and German¬†
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Azure Cloud Consultant (REF1499H)
About us:As Cloud Migration Services (CMS) part of T-Systems, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it‚Äôs a transition from different Cloud or it‚Äôs their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.Your Tasks:As Cloud Consultant for Cloud Adoption Services you will be responsible for defining cloud strategies, migration roadmaps and building cloud governance models. You will help our global customers to successfully adopt public cloud to support their strategic goals.Help customers shape their journey of adopting Amazon Web Services, Azure or Google Cloud Platform and provide them with technical and strategic guidance to accelerate their cloud transformation.Lead customer engagements from pre-sales to delivery and act as link between the customer, sales and technical project team.Conduct customer workshops to understand technology and business drivers and present technical concepts.¬†Work with our Product Managers to continuously improve our Cloud Adoption portfolio providing insights on customer projects and market trends.¬†Advise on technology and strategic vision, define cloud adoption and migration strategies and hand-off to architect and migration teams.
Your Profile:We are looking for someone with an entrepreneurial spirit who is keen to make a positive impact for our customers. You are passionate about supporting enterprises to adopt public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:A university degree in computer science or a related degree5+ years of relevant work experience with public cloud technologies (AWS, Azure or GCP)A deep technical understanding of public cloud technologies and practical experience in public cloud adoption and migrationExperience with advocating and implementing Cloud Adoption Frameworks on AWS, Azure or GCP and other meaningful best practicesFamiliarity with application discovery tools and cloud migration software is asset but not essentialA can-do attitude which helps you to stand out in a fail fast cultureVery high motivation and the ability to thrive in a dynamic environmentPassion to work in a global and diverse organization and environmentExcellent presentation and communication skills (spoken and written English)
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Backend Developer (REF882R)
This position is filled in the Data Intelligence BU in the Digital Solutions portfolio unit of T-Systems International GmbH. The Data Economy chapter focuses on the development of the Telekom Data Intelligence Hub (DIH). We use the full range of data sources, from IoT to social media, to create sustainable innovation/value from the use of data and AI building blocks. Our solutions are both the memory and the brain of digitization. We use state-of-the-art open-source technologies and reference architectures from the IDS and GAIA-X environment. Always with the goal of bringing our customers' digitization strategies to success in the context of data spaces. As Germany's largest digital service provider, we shape the digital world together with our customers in a constantly growing market.
Main tasks
Take part in creating software solutions in scaled agile environment (Less, SAFe) as a member of a cross functional team
Build cloud hosted, micro-services Java/Kotlin applications considering holistic business requirements and implications along the entire development process
Write scalable and maintainable code
Ensure quality in every aspect of your work, from writing and maintaining documentation, doing code reviews or testing
Collaborate with other teams in an international environment (Germany, Hungary, Russia, India)
Required skills
Bachelor or master‚Äôs degree in the following areas: Computer science, Engineering or Information Technology or equivalent work experience in IT
3-5 years of overall IT experience of which majorly in technologies involving Java frameworks, SQL and NoSQL databases, Cloud services, Big Data technologies
Expert coding skills specially in Java and other related popular programming languages
Parsing and serializing/reserializing JSON messages
Persistence handling (persisting data at rest), relational databases
Oauth
Interface implementation REST
Unit testing (JUnit etc.)
Integration of REST interfaces
Security related coding; Token signature verification(JSON Web Signatures),¬† Audit log message integrity protection (Signatures, Linked Data Proofs), Verifiable Credentials, cryptographic protocols
Understanding of Load balancing, service integrity, and operations
Experience developing service/microservice oriented applications
Good English written and oral skills, German is a plus
Nice to have
Understanding of current version of Gaia-X specifications and architecture
Understanding of RDF Data Models

Software Engineer (Mid/Senior/Expert) (REF275E)
We are looking for exceptional‚ÄØSoftware Engineers‚ÄØto work with our cross-functional team and join our world-class community of talented developers in the exciting field of information technology.
You'll get direct experience designing, developing, testing & deploying services that work at high scale and with enterprise reliability. You'll be working in a multinational company being a key player in developing and improving new and existing products. We are open to the following OOP languages: Python, Java, JavaScript. Cloud infrastructure is part of our everyday life. We offer you technical challenges and career advancement as well.
We strongly believe striking the balance between work and family is very important and our culture is focused on the well-being of our team and their loved ones.

Collaborate with various engineering & cross-functional teams, to execute engineering challenges

Participate also in technical design, development and code reviews. Be responsible for implemented functionality, quality code and technical documentation
Understands business and technical objectives of a project and works closely with analysts and the test team

Working in agile and team context

System Engineer ‚Äì OS Image and Support on Hybrid Cloud (REF1284Q)
Our company in Switzerland has just recently built up the Country‚Äôs biggest Hybrid Cloud solution based on the product Open Telecom Cloud, an Openstack implementation. This is already a successor of the previous environment that was used by a singular customer, and now is scaling up and we are looking for people to join our team.
For this matter we are in need of Engineers to work in a DevOps structure in our international team together wtih the Swiss counterpart, to develop, maintain and support the OS images and the representative provisioning layer of the VMs this cloud solution is offering to current and future customers.
We do look for individual people who would join the team either as a RHEL or Windows engineer.
Skills:
To have a deep understanding of the Operating System layer (RHEL or Windows Server) with 3-5 years of experience working on field of an OS Administrator or similar

Azure Cloud Migration Architect (REF1500R)
About us:
As Cloud Migration Services (CMS) part of T-Systems, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it‚Äôs a transition from different Cloud or it‚Äôs their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.
Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.
¬†Your Tasks:
As the Cloud Architect for Migration you will be responsible for ensuring the Cloud adoption strategy by defining the cloud adoption roadmap aligned with the target platform solution design, business strategies and the existing landscape environment. You will be responsible for creating the optimal migration journey by leveraging TSI standards as well as cloud native tooling and processes. You will be also contributing to creation and improvement of the migration scenarios, set of best practices and leveraging Zero Touch approach wherever possible.¬† As Cloud Architect, it will be in your responsibility to manage the engagement with cloud service providers through the build and run phases to ensure that customer achieves maximum value from cloud initiatives and services
Implement complex customer requirements in technical solutions in accordance with best practices, cost-efficiency and future security based on Microsoft Azure
Develop both High-Level and Low-Level design for all possible variations of migration or transformation to hybrid cloud products (private/public) based on Azure
Optimize all onboarding scenarios for customers on private & public cloud together with 3rd party products for migration
Cooperate with the product owner on the continuous development of the T-systems cloud adoption portfolio
Collaborate with sales on preparation of complex customer inquiries and tenders
Be an advisor for local and international customers on optimal cloud adoption strategies on Azure
Collaborate directly with end customers, with T-systems partners and international teams
Your Profile:
We are looking for an individual with strong background in public cloud technologies who is ready to help customers on their migration journey to public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:
5+ years of relevant work experience with Azure cloud technologies
A deep technical understanding of public cloud technologies and practical experience in public cloud adoption and migration
Experience with advocating and implementing Cloud Adoption Frameworks on Azure and other meaningful best practices
A can-do attitude which helps you to stand out in a fail fast culture
Passion to work in a global and diverse organization and environment
Excellent presentation and communication skills (spoken and written English)
Familiarity with application discovery tools and cloud migration software is an asset but not essential
Experience with Infrastructure as Code is an asset but not essential

Our partner is - a global ICT services business - looking for a Network & Security Engineer for their team in Budapest. Their team is responsible for the management of the network & security devices in Datacenters, Connectivity towards customers and cloud providers, and on-premises network & security implementations at Customers.
Network & Security Engineer
Tasks
Manages the design, implementation and ongoing management, including LAN, WAN, and Wireless Environments. Coordinates with networking vendors to ensure appropriate platform integration and performance. Makes recommendations to senior management on new technologies and products for enhancement of the network;
Leads and participates in the installation of Network systems and equipment for new facilities and expansions. Tests, debugs and analyses performance, and documents infrastructure components;
Develops Network infrastructure installation procedures to ensure successful integration of systems hardware/software. Develops and recommends technical strategies and solutions to maintain and/or expand service levels with end to end security in mind;
Monitors and analyzes network, and provides results on a regular basis. Takes corrective action to improve data network;
Responds to emergency situations and can perform effective troubleshooting during production outages;
Proactively test & upgrade software on various devices;
Analyze capacity management reports & propose improvements;
Requirements
5+ years of experience in Networking Field with vendor products like Cisco (Routing & Firewall (ASA/Firepower) / Catalyst & Nexus Switching / Aironet Wireless),¬† Fortinet;
Palo Alto/ Checkpoint/ Fortinet (Firewall);
Expert with implementing and supporting OSPF, BGP, VRRP and other routing protocols;
Fluency in English;
Experience with Cisco ACI/ISE/PRIME/Meraki;
Wireless/Firewall/SDWAN and F5 (GTM, APM) is an advantage;

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.¬†
DevOps Engineer (VNI1- EDG_BNG) (REF219H)
Our group VNI is responsible for the integration, validation and production of test results ("System Under Test") in accordance with the requirements of the Deutsche Telekom AG Platform, as measured by the diversity of the group. The work is carried out in several virtual squads within the group, mainly with german but also international colleagues. In one of these squads, called EDG_BNG, we are looking for an experienced DevOps Engineer colleague.¬†
The squad EDG_BNG is responsible for engineering, basic testing, product compliance (solution), SSt test (composite test with IT), PV, rollout and the active operation of the BNG. Tasks include:Lifecycle Management (E4X) for the Components and System Software of the BNG, drive further development of the BNG
Tasks:¬†
Description/Creation/Revision of test cases Automation of test cases Specification of product features environment
Cisco CCNP exam or equivalent knowledge and relevant experience
Strong intermediate knowledge of German
Openness to new network technologies, like BNG
Phython and JavaScript knowhow
Basic knowhow about Test Automation Framework ( TAF)
Accurate and thorough work, inclination to learn, teamwork¬†
Advantage:¬†
Knowledge of Cisco CCNP-SP / Juniper JNCIA
English intermediate level
Experience in agile methodology

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
API Architect - Java (REF1191K)
The System Architect defines needed or recommend software optimizations to ensure reliability, availability, robustness and performance of the software in operations. The System Architect may also recommend optimizations based on security requirements and define ‚ÄúHOW‚Äù a technical solution can be realized.¬†¬†
She/He is responsible for considering non-functional requirements (NFRs) & using automated tools & methods to obtain insight into the software API base as efficiently and quickly as possible.¬†¬†
The System Architects will support a Technical API Review/Audit in DTIT.¬†

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Azure Cloud Consultant (REF1579Y)
About us:
As Cloud Migration Services (CMS) part of T-Systems, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it‚Äôs a transition from different Cloud or it‚Äôs their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.
Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.
Your Tasks:
As Cloud Consultant for Cloud Adoption Services you will be responsible for defining cloud strategies, migration roadmaps and building cloud governance models. You will help our global customers to successfully adopt public cloud to support their strategic goals.
Help customers shape their journey of adopting Amazon Web Services, Azure or Google Cloud Platform and provide them with technical and strategic guidance to accelerate their cloud transformation.
Lead customer engagements from pre-sales to delivery and act as link between the customer, sales and technical project team.
Conduct customer workshops to understand technology and business drivers and present technical concepts.
¬†Work with our Product Managers to continuously improve our Cloud Adoption portfolio providing insights on customer projects and market trends.
¬†Advise on technology and strategic vision, define cloud adoption and migration strategies and hand-off to architect and migration teams.
Your Profile:
We are looking for someone with an entrepreneurial spirit who is keen to make a positive impact for our customers. You are passionate about supporting enterprises to adopt public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:
A university degree in computer science or a related degree
5+ years of relevant work experience with public cloud technologies (AWS, Azure or GCP)
A deep technical understanding of public cloud technologies and practical experience in public cloud adoption and migration
Experience with advocating and implementing Cloud Adoption Frameworks on AWS, Azure or GCP and other meaningful best practices
Familiarity with application discovery tools and cloud migration software is asset but not essential
A can-do attitude which helps you to stand out in a fail fast culture
Very high motivation and the ability to thrive in a dynamic environment
Passion to work in a global and diverse organization and environment
Excellent presentation and communication skills (spoken and written English)

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. AWS Cloud Migration Engineer (REF1548J)
About us¬†
¬†‚ÄãIn the AWS PowerHouse, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it‚Äôs a transition from different Cloud or it‚Äôs their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.
Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest, and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.
Your Tasks
As the AWS Migration Engineer, you will be executing the migration & transformation strategy for our customers as part of an agile migration team, headed by the AWS¬†Migration Architect. Among your main responsibilities will be performing migrations from On-Premises Cloud and Cloud to Cloud, utilizing the most efficient tools available. You will be also consulted for relevant documentation, defining, and improving migration plans and processes, performing landscape deployments (both manual and automated) and validations. You will be part of an international team, where you‚Äôll be managing tasks and working closely together with the Architect for Migration teams during the migrations.
Perform various migrations between Clouds or from premises to Cloud based on customers‚Äô requirements and needs, focusing on AWS
Optimize all onboarding scenarios for customers on public cloud together with 3rd party products for migration
Work in highly dynamic, international environment and with customer representatives in the team, while serving as the technology expert
Collaborate with T-systems partners such as AWS and others
Directly communicate with end customers to discuss possibilities of migration, transformation, and their optimal designs
Your Profile
We are looking for someone with an entrepreneurial spirit who is keen to make a positive impact for our customers. You are a team player always ready to learn technologies and ready to support enterprises to adopt public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:
2+ years of relevant work experience on AWS with basic certification
Understanding of migration concepts and migration tooling (the ex. AWS Application Migration Service, etc.) ¬†
Understanding of Infrastructure as Code and automation possibilities (ex. Terraform)
Experience in Continuous Deployment tools and Version control tools (GitLab)
Very high motivation and the ability to thrive in a dynamic environment
General ICT skills (Network, OS, Storage, Database etc.)
Basic Scripting & Coding knowledge (PowerShell, Bash, Python)
Some experience with Agile tooling and processes

Solution Engineer (REF1552J)
Tasks
You will develop¬†and operate our own¬†web portal built from scratch
You will develop applications to¬†automate internal processes and systems (legacy MPLS VPN technologies)
You can prove your creativity! We build a system, and we give¬†a free hand in¬†designing, too.¬†
You can work in a young, dynamic team,¬†where individual responsibilities are not limited
You will work in an agile work method
At Deutsche Telekom, we are committed to providing our customers with the best quality and most reliable service. As part of our commitment, it is important to be able to track and trace our processes in a transparent and up-to-date way. Our team in Germany is working on a web-based tool to administering maintenances on our network. In addition, this software will help our colleagues to record these maintenance tasks in a simple and collision-free way. We are looking for a new colleague to join our team to further develop our solutions together. If you are creative person, who like to see through complex problems and have a passion for problem solving, we are looking for you!

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Repl/Developer - automation (REF680G)
Our Automation Team is looking for enthusiastic team members, with passion to participate in global development projects. We are continuously creating easy-to-use, fast and reliable software automation solutions for internal customers over the company group.
As a junior developer you will:
learn and develop different content and business flow migration solutions,
deliver integration services with the help of our experienced colleagues,
utilize your development skills to ensure that customer requirements of security, data recoverability and integrity are met.
Your path:
As a member of our team, on this job you will build your expertise in the field of:
web programming
web services, protocols and middleware
object oriented software development and scripting
database development
server virtualization and automation
business process modeling, prototype visualization, software design
software testing and implementation, version control and repository management
international and remote collaboration
agile and scrum methodology
As a candidate you have to
hold degree in IT or have completed a coding bootcamp
be fluent in English
As an outstanding candidate, beyond the basics, you would
hold university degree in IT with software development specialization¬†
share publicly available reference projects
have IT related work experience
have work experience in programming
be familiar with CMS/ECM solutions
Junior

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Cloud Engineer with Containerization skillset (GCP knowledge) (REF1502Z)
About us:‚ÄãAs Cloud Migration Services (CMS) part of T-Systems, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it‚Äôs a transition from different Cloud or it‚Äôs their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.Your Tasks:Experience working with container build and runtime technologies.Hands on experience deploying and supporting Kubernetes on at least one IaaS provider.A deep technical understanding of public cloud technologies and practical experience in public cloud adoption, migration and automation.Strong hands-on experience in one or more of Containers and Container Orchestration frameworks is an advantage.Familiarity with application discovery tools and cloud migration software is an asset but not essential.Understanding of Infrastructure as Code and automation possibilities. (Terraform, ARM templates, Ansible, SaltStack)

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 4500 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Cloud DevOps Engineer (REF270Z)
This position is filled in the Data Intelligence BU in the Digital Solutions portfolio unit of T-Systems International GmbH. The Data Economy chapter focuses on the development of the Telekom Data Intelligence Hub (DIH). We use the full range of data sources, from IoT to social media, to create sustainable innovation/value from the use of data and AI building blocks. Our solutions are both the memory and the brain of digitization. We use state-of-the-art open-source technologies and reference architectures from the IDS and GAIA-X environment. Always with the goal of bringing our customers' digitization strategies to success in the context of data spaces. As Germany's largest digital service provider, we shape the digital world together with our customers in a constantly growing market.
Main tasks
setup CI/CD pipelines for microservices
create deployment scripts for applications
create and maintain infrastructure solutions and Infrastructure as Code scripts
support testers with test automation setup
create monitoring solutions for application and infrastructure
create releases and deploy them to production
support developers with build automation and ci/cd
ensure applications are provided in zero downtime manner
ensure schedule and commitments are met
act as 3rd level support in case of incidents
working in an agile environment with cross-functional teams and DevOps working mode
Background and required skills:
Bachelor or Master‚Äôs degree in the following areas: Computer science, Engineering or Information Technology or equivalent work experience in IT
Excellent knowledge in the following topics: Dealing with agile process models, scaling in an agile environment (Scrum of Scrum, SAFe), as well as proven experience in the application of Scrum, Kanban, Design Thinking and/or other agile methods
3+ years of DevOps or Infrastructure Engineering experience
experience with build and packaging tools like maven, gradle, npm, yarn
experience witch CI/CD pipelines
experience with IaC (Ansible, Puppet, Terraform)
experience with GitOps Approach
experience maintaining and deploying to Kubernetes (managed/unmanaged on cloud, on premises)
experience with public clouds (Azure, AWS, Google)
good understanding of networks esp. in cloud environments
knowledge of microservices architecture and cloud native designs
good English written and oral skills. German is a plus
Tools experience:
git

Do you have good analytical skills and a result-oriented mindset? Are you ready to kickstart your career in a multilingual environment where you can use your language skills on a daily basis? Would you like to work for one of the largest providers of information technology, consulting services and business process outsourcing? If your answer is YES, perfect!¬†¬†
Join one of the worlds biggest multinational companies in Budapest as a Service Desk Analyst! 
We are looking for fresh grads with strong language knowledge or candidates with 1-3 years of experience!
Multilingual Service Desk Analyst
Feladatok
As a Service Desk Analyst (Level 1) you will resolve IT issues for our multinational customers together with your colleagues in an international team.
They will contact you via email, phone, chat or a self-service portal and your task will be to support them¬† by resolving the issue on the spot or by coordinating with other technician teams (Level 2) to find the resolution.
Besides IT troubleshooting, your responsibilities will include administration and translation of these incoming requests, providing information to both customers and IT teams and follow-up on unresolved cases to make sure that the teams targets are met.

have confident level of English knowledge and fluent level of German/French/Italian/Dutch/Polish/Greek

a great diversity of nationalities, cultures and business areas: almost 50% of our team is international; your colleagues are from 80 countries.

Volunteering, sport and employee events: You will be part of a great community where you can engage in various sports, social responsibility activities, student or employee events while making nice memories with your teammates.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Senior Technical Writer (Open Telekom Cloud) REF1254G
The Public Cloud Portfolio Unit operates on a national and international level, for medium-sized and large companies. We develop, market and operate agile, cloud-native, forward-looking products and services for the digital world. We see ourselves as innovation drivers and make our customers' business fit for the digital future. Our mission: Together with our customer, shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future.
Your Department
We run Open Telekom Cloud! Open Telekom Cloud is a public cloud standard product based on open source community software and driven by principles of DevSecOps. Lean structures, agile methods, highly motivated teams and an extremely dynamic business environment determine our actions. With this customer-oriented and agile orientation, we are the anchor point for the Public Cloud business in Deutsche Telekom Group.
We are measured by delivering a secure, stable and innovative platform. We work jointly with our platform partner and other partners out of the OpenStack ecosystem to create a highly innovative public cloud product based on European security and data protection standards.
We are looking for people who are professionals and evangelists with a great deal of enthusiasm for cloud technology and who are up to the challenges created by the development and operation of a hyper-scale public cloud.
We offer a unique insight into how a large public cloud works under the hood, intercultural teamwork, flat hierarchies and an independent work-style.
Your Tasks
As "Technical Writer" you understand the latest developments in cloud and container technologies. You moderate our Open Telekom Cloud customer communities and produce content that helps our customers make better use of our cloud.
Do you like?
Support and follow the rapid evolution of the Open Telekom Cloud product and feature releases by establishing trusted relationships with engineering, product and care teams.
Analyze, recommend, and document best practices and offering alternatives to our customers.
Understand the different information types (text, video, storybooks, flow diagrams, etc.) and produce well-structured, task-focused content suitable to the audience.
Manage the publishing process for the content, ensuring that stakeholders are engaged in content development and revision activities, including review and approval cycles.
Create technical solutions and best practices and be able to translate them into simple tutorials.
Create our own community and keep continuous contact with other open-source communities.
Review and edit content created by experts for technical accuracy and clarity.
Create blog posts, social media posts, vlogs or podcasts and run campaigns on social media.
Moderate different communication channels.
Your Profile 
¬†At least 3+ years of professional experience in IT.
Deep technical knowledge of software-, cloud- and container- technologies.
Strong customer focus.
Ability to assess technical solutions and come up with creative approaches.
Strong experience with blog posts, social media posts, vlogs, podcasts, or tutorials.
Strong practice with social media, ideally with open-source communities.
Fluency in written and spoken English.
You will be working in the European Union to meet our customers' data security and privacy requirements.
Internal Briefing
Optional: Technologies (public clouds, preferably OpenStack-based, Docker, Kubernetes) or excellent networking with the relevant OpenSource communities and many years of experience in OpenSource projects.
Optional: Experience with Agile development methods (e.g. DevOps, Scrum, Kanban) and tools (e.g. GitHub, JIRA, Confluence)

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.¬†
Senior Devops Engineer (REF214E)
Our group is responsible for the integration, validation and production of test results ("System Under Test") in accordance with the requirements of the Deutsche Telekom AG Platform, as measured by the diversity of the group. The work is carried out in several virtual squads within the group, mainly with german but also international colleagues. In one of these squads, called NNA_AAC , we are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer colleague.
Tasks
Scope of NNA_AAC Squad: Development of automation use cases based on the automation tool NDO (Network and Domain Orchestrator) as part of the project "[email¬†protected]", test automation.
System management, automation and integration of network related systems within IPC
Realization and implementation of automation solutions IP Core by means of SDN Orchestrator (NDO)
Test automation (CI/CD)
Requirements
Network knowledge and experience Cisco CCNP level or similar level in Juniper
Experience with network automation and Netconf
Intermediate Python skills with min 1-2 years experience
Data modeling (ideally using YANG, but XSD experience translates easily)
Experience with REST, JSON, YAML, Linux, Git/Gitlab, CI/CD, Docker
Ideally, experience with Kubernetes

Security Solution Administrator - Antivirus Operation (REF565Y)
Tasks
Operation, policy management, event analysis and reporting of different solutions
Responsible for maintaining, managing, and administering the environments, including daily monitoring of the consoles/systems for event traffic
Review security reports and implement policy and exclusions based on risk analyses
Apply updates, patches and make configuration changes to tighten security.
Advisory and support services to customer with regards of the above products and their operation
Proactive threat management in product operation
Incident and Change management
Collaboration with German colleagues
Collaboration with the Vendors
Preparing and introduction of new releases
Creating and updating processes
Requirements
Relevant professional (Security) experience
At least intermediate English and German language skills
Basic understanding of Windows Server; Active Directory

Good communication ability
Customer-oriented approach and precision
System approach, precision
Quick understanding of complex problems

Location

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, P√©cs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Architect (REF1102F)
Job Description :
The DevOps expert should further develop our container services based on Kubernetes and Rancher in project mode. Furthermore, activities in the Azure Cloud environment may arise in the context of automation for applications of a customer. Work will be done in an agile team for a major customer in the logistics environment.
Tasks :
Conversion of Kubernetes clusters from Docker-CE to ContainerD.
Integration of Azure AKS into the service
Development of a roadmap for the migration of existing clusters into the revised service
Presentation of the results to the customer and internally
Internal training for the team
Support cloud migrations of applications to the AZURE Cloud, if applicable.
Support automation of service deployments in the cloud context, if applicable.
Knowhow on the topics :
Kubernetes
Rancher
Containers
Microsoft AZURE Cloud
Terraform
Ansible
Gitlab
Github
AZURE Dev/OpS
Linux knowledge preferably Red Hat
Experience with building and deploying IaaS components
Experience with the deployment of PaaS components
Language skills: German and English
Independent work in an agile environment
Creation/presentation of own ideas for the further development of the services
Communicative and social skills
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

ServiceNow Developer (REF363C)

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary‚Äôs independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019.
